title: Childcare Costs
text:
This dataset comes from the National Database of Childcare Prices (NDCP), which is (one of) the most comprehensive federal source of childcare at the county level. Data provided by Thomas Mock.

library(tidyverse)

childcare_costs <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2023/2023-05-09/childcare_costs.csv')

childcare_costs |>
ggplot( aes( x = mcsa, y = pr_f ) ) +
  geom_point(color = "blue", alpha = 0.1) +
  labs( x = "median price charged for center-based care who are school age",
        y = "poverty rate for familie" )








Data taken from TidyTuesday GitHub Repository: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data
Data originally sourced from National Database of Childcare Prices:
https://www.dol.gov/agencies/wb/topics/featured-childcare

title: The Scent of Data
text:
This dataset contains information about perfumes webscraped from Parfumo (community of perfume enthusiasts) by Olga G..

library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

parfumo_data_clean <- readr::read_csv('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/main/data/2024/2024-12-10/parfumo_data_clean.csv')

brand_vs_rating <- parfumo_data_clean |>
  group_by(Brand) |>
  summarize( Average_Rating_Value = mean(Rating_Value, na.rm = TRUE) ) |>
  arrange( desc( Average_Rating_Value ) ) 

top10_brand_vs_rating <- head( brand_vs_rating, 10)
  
ggplot( top10_brand_vs_rating, aes( x = Brand, y = Average_Rating_Value, fill = Brand ) ) +
  geom_bar( stat = "identity") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank())








Data taken from TidyTuesday GitHub Repository: https://github.com/rfordatascience/tidytuesday/tree/main/data
Data originally sourced from Perfumo:
https://www.parfumo.com/

title: Zhesheng(Jason) Xu
text:
Hi there! Iâ€™m Jason, my hometown is Shanghai, China! I am currently a student at Pomona College, CA, where I am studying neuroscience and data science. I am also a part of a club called Health Bridges where I get to volunteer at Pomona Valley Hospital as a non-medical translator! In my free time, I like to play the guitar (Chinese folk songs are my favorite!). Look around my website to learn more!
I used Quarto to build this website, the link to the repository is here: https://github.com/ASTROXXXXX/ASTROXXXXX.github.io
